content: Bhavanashuddheekaranam

items.content: Kartthaave! Ninte samaadhaanavum shaantiyum ee bhavanatthil vasippichu ithilulllla sakalattheyum anugrahikkaname. Ithile varavuchelavukall thirunaamamahathvatthinnum neethiyude paripaalanatthinum aayirikkumaaraakaname. Ninnil ninnulllla sakala nanmakallaalum anugrahangallaalum ithine aishvaryappedutthi ithil vasikkunnavarkku mukhaprasannatha nalkaname. Aayushkkaalam muzhuvanum rahasyakaaryangallilum parasyakaaryangallilum ivar ninne preethippedutthuvaanidayaakaname. Nyangallude kartthaavum nithyadaivavume! Ivarude marichupoyavarkku aashvaasavum nalla ormmayum nalkaname. Moraanvaalohaan…

content: Kukkiliyon (1-aam raagam)

Ennaathmaavine ningkaluyartthunnen naathhaa! - haale... U - haa...
Neeyen sharanam laji - kkaruthe nyaan.

Vairikallennechollippukazharuthe - haale... U - haa...
Lajikkaruthe ninnaa - shritharaarum.

Doshikall naanikkum paazhppaniyil - haale... U - haa...
Naathhaa! Nin paathakallenne - kaattiduka.

Ariyikkanamenne nin cheruvazhikall- haale... U - haa...
Neril nayichennepparishee - lippikka.
Baarekmor. Shubaho… menaolam…
Ekkbo
Lanbeeyo

Naravathsalane!-jalanidhiyil
Nibi yonaaye - veendavane!
Durithamahaajala nidhiyathil ni-
Nnadiyaare veendee - de - nam.
Sthaumenkaalos…

items.content: Ningall praveshikkunna sakala bhavanangallkkum samaadhaanam aashamsippeen ennu thiruvaayu mozhinyavanaaya kartthaaveshumishihaa! Ninakku sthuthi. Kartthaave! Ninte samaadhaanavum aikyavum ee bhavanatthil undaakumaaraakaname. Ellaavidha naashangallilninnum ithinte vaathilppadikallkku nee mudrayidaname. Sakalavidha vedanakallilninnum rogangallilninnum paapangallilninnum ithil paarkkunnavare kaatthukollllaname. Ithil vasikkunnavare nyerukkangallil ninnum duഃkhangallilninnum samrakshichukollllaname. Sakalavidha thettukallilninnum klechchhathakallilninnum ivare rakshichukollllaname. Oo bhavanatthile sameepasthhare kaatthukollllukayum doorasthhare thirichuvarutthukayum rogikalle sandarshikkukayum paretharkku paapaparihaaram nalkukayum cheyyaname. Ithil nivasikkunnavare ninte sathyavum ninnilulllla bhakthiyum ninte karunayum snehavum dayavum kondu niraykkaname. Ee bhavanam shuddheekarikkappedunna ee samayatthum ellaa perunnaallukallilum..... Ninne ivar bahumaanichu vandichu sthuthikkukayum cheyyaname. Bkulhun…

Dahippikkunna agniyaaya Daivam parishuddha thrithvatthinte drshdashdaantatthil thante snehithanaaya abrahaaminte adutthu chennu. Avidunnu thante bahumaanyathayude aunnathyatthil ninnirangivannu vrkshatthanalil vishramichu. Parudeesaayile vrkshangalle nattavan oru daridraneppole bhoomiyil koodi sancharichu. Svargam thante simhaasanavum bhoomi paadapeedhavum aayirikkunnavan oru nissaaraneppole abrahaaminte adutthuchennu. Maalaakhamaarkkupolum nerenokkuvaan kazhivillaatthavanaaya daivatthe abrahaam kandu odi chennu thirumumpaake vandikkukayum “kartthaave! Avidutthe dayaadrshdi ennilundengkil avidutthe daasane vittu pokaruthe. Alpam vellllam edutthu nyaan avidutthe kaalukalle kazhukikkollllatte. Vrkshatthin keezhil vishramichu appakkashanangalledutthu bhakshichu thrpthiyaayashesham pokaam, avidunnu ingane ee daasante adutthukoodi kadannupokuvaanidayaayallo" ennapekshikkukayum cheythu. Avidutthe mahaneeyathaykku ithu preethikaramaayitthonnukayum oru ksheenithaneppole avide vishramikkukayum svadaasanaaya abrahaam villampikkodutthava vismayakaramaam vidham bhakshikkukayum avaneyum bhaaryayaaya saaraayeyum avante sampaadyangalleyum anugrahikkukayum cheythu. Kartthaave! Thirumumpaake nyangallarppichirikkunna ee sugandhadhoopam moolam ee ninte daasante bhavanattheyum sampatthukalleyum anugrahikkaname + ippoll ee bhavanatthilum ithile nivaasikallkkum vendi karunayum krpayum ninnodu nyangall yaachikkunnu. Ee ninte bhrthyante yaachana thirusannidhiyil etthukayum ee bhavanam aishvaryamullllathaayittheerukayum ithile nivaasikall kuttamillaatthavaraayittheernnu rakshapraapikkukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Ninte kunyaadukall ninte pulmaalikallil meyukayum ninte pennaadukall ninte nanmakallaal thrptharaakukayum nyangallellaavarum ninnilninnu karuna praapikkukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Paapikallil karuna cheyyunnavanum anuthaapikallil preethippedunnavanumaaya kartthaave! Ninte mahaakarunayaal nyangallil kanivuthonni nyangalle anugrahikkukayum thiruvullllamthonni nyangallude praarththhanakallum dhoopavum amgeekarikkukayum nyangallude aathmaakkalle vishuddheekarikkukayum nyangallkkum vishvaasikallaaya nyangallude paretharkkum paapamochanam nalkukayum cheyyaname. Nyangall ninakkum ninte pithaavinum parishuddharoohaaykkum sthuthiyum sthothravum karettunnu. Hosho…

content:
Vaazhvettabraahaam--thaathan than bhavanam
/tmoonnu pumaanmaaraal
/tsaakshaal manavaallan mashihaa
/tsakkaayu bhavanatthe vaazhtthi,
Svaaraadhakare - riya veettil - thrithvam vaaneedaname nal-
/tthalamaruyaa--lithu vaazhtthappedanam.

Evangelonil--moraan shishyarodaayu
/tcholli ketten nyaan
/tkaikkollvoo ningalle veede-
/tthaavee - denne kaikkollvoo
Abraahaamin bhavanam pol - nyangallananyoru bhavanatthe
/trakshakane! - vaazhtthuka thrkkaiyaal.
Baarekmor, shubaho…

Shoonyaaranyatthil - nedi samthrpthi,
/tjanamanchappatthaal
/tshreshdhaa-chaaryanmaaraarnno-
/treege - hattheyumathinullllil
Paarpporeyum rakshakane!
Thrkkaiyaal vaazhtthaname nal
/tthalamurayaa - lithu vaazhtthappedanam
Menaolam ...

E - liyaavi - nnaasheervvaadatthaal; vidhavaagehatthil
/tkumbha - tthil dhaanyappodiyum
/tkompil thailavumattilla
Aa varamaarnneedatte nin – bhaktharananyoru bhavanam nal
/tthalamurayaa – lithu vaazhtthappedanam.
Moriyo…

items.content: Ningall chellumpoll ningalle sveekarikkunna ethubhavanavum enneyaakunnu sveekarikkunnathennu thante parishuddha shishyanmaarodu arullicheythavanaaya mishihaathampuraane! Ninte aaraadhakarude ee bhavanatthe anugrahikkukayum ninte parishuddha naamammoolam ninte ee daasare santoshippikkukayum cheyyaname. Santoshavum aanandavum niranya prasanna mukhangallodukoode ninnil ninnu randulokangallilum nalla prathiphalam praapikkuvaan ivarkku krpa nalkukayum cheyyaname.

content: Pethgomo

Haaleluyyaa-u-haalelooyyaa-naathhaa! Nin vellivum vishvaasamathum nalkeedaname;
Saantvanamarulli paavanagirishibirangallilekku nayicheedanamenne. Haaleluyyaa.

items.content: Yeshu yareehovil koodi kadannupokumpoll dhanavaanum chungkakkaarude pramaaniyumaaya 'sakkaayi' ennu perulllla oruvan Yeshu aaraanennu kaanuvaanaagrahichu. Purushaaram nimittham athu kazhinyilla. Entennaal sakkaayi pokkam kuranyavanaayirunnu. Avan yeshuvine kaanuvaanaayittu mumpe odi oru kaattatthiyil kayariyirunnu. Athileyaayirunnu yeshuvinu pokendiyirunnath. Aasthhalatthetthiyappoll Yeshu avane kandittu avanodu "sakkaayi! Nee vegam irangivarika. Innenikku ninte veettil thaamasikkendiyirikkunnu" ennu paranyu. Avan vegam irangichennu santoshatthode addehatthe sveekarichu. Ellaavarum athukandu neerasappett: “ivan paapiyaaya manushyante adukkalchennu thaamasichuvallo" ennu paranyu. Sakkaayi ninnukondu yeshuvinodu “kartthaave! Ithaa ente vasthukkallil pakuthi nyaan daridrarkku kodukkunnu. Ethoruvanil ninnengkilum nyaan apaharichittullllathu onninu naaluveetham thirichu kodukkukayum cheyyunnu" ennu paranyu. Yeshu paranyu; “ivanum abrahaaminte puthranaakakondu innu ee bhavanatthinu rakshayundaayi. Entennaal kaanaathe poyittullllathine anveshichu rakshikkuvaanaayittaanu manushyaputhran vannirikkunnath.”

content: (maar yaakkobinte bovooso)

Kartthaave! Ninnaardratha nirayum vaathil thurannee
Praarththhana kettittaathmaakkallinpundaakenam.

Goodham veettil praarththhippathilaanudayonishdam
Shabdatthaalallaarnnathu bhaagyam dharmmishdhanmaar

Saumyan mosha praarththhanamoolam bhaagichaazhi
Koottam neengi, dushdan, pharavon mungippoyi

Daaveedin praarththhana ketteeshannaardratha thonni
Paapam mochichekee veendum pravachanashakthi.

Choollaykkullllil haananiyanmaar praarththhichappoll
Theekkundattheennavare Daivam samrakshichu.

Niryaanam, nyaayatthinpeedham, narakam moonnum
Bheeyetteedunnen kartthaave! Ennullllatthil
Moriyo…

items.content: Daivaadhidaivavum, kartthaadhikartthaavum vishvaasapoorvvam thanne villikkunnavarkku marupadi nalkunnavanumaayullllave! Balaheenanum paapiyumaaya ninte daasanaakunna nyaan ayogyanengkilum ente balaheenamaaya praarththhana sveekarikkaname. Nohineyum makkelleyum mrgangalleyum pakshikalleyum izhajantukkalleyum jalaprallayatthilninnu pettakatthil nee samrakshichathupoleyum, ninte snehithanaaya abrahaamine raajaakkanmaarude vaallilninnu rakshichu avaneyum avante sampatthukalleyum anugrahichaprakaaravum, sodomile agniyil ninnu lotthine rakshichathupoleyum, laabaante bhavanatthil vachu yaakkobine nee kaatthu avane valiyavanaakki sampaadyangall varddhippichu kodutthathupoleyum, misremil vachu yauseppine nee samrakshichu bharanaadhipanaakkittheerkkukayum avante sampaadyavum varavukallum varddhippikkukayum apakadangallilninnu kaatthukollllukayum cheythathupoleyum, punyavaanaaya eeyyobinte sampaadyangall avante parishodhanaykkushesham irattiyaayi varddhippichathupoleyum, moshayeyum israayel janattheyum samudratthilninnum pharavonil ninnum samrakshichaprakaaravum, moshayude praarththhanayum aharonte dhoopavum phinahaasinte vaallum moolam israayelil ninnu kopavum maranavum nirodhichathupoleyum, karunaapoornnanum thante srshdiyodu dayavullllavanumaaya kartthaave! Ninte ee daasante bhavanatthil vasikkunna ellaavarilninnum kopavadikallum kadhinashikshakallum vividhathararogangallum vyaadhikallum ellaa apakadangallum krpayode nirodhikkaname. Daivamaathaavaaya mariyaaminteyum parishuddhanaaya maar…… nteyum sakala parishuddhanmaarudeyum praarththhanayaal nyangallil karunayum krpayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Aammeen

content: Vellllam vaazhtthunna praarththhana
Bhavanashuddheekaranatthinulllla thallippaayittheeruvaan thakkavannam pithaavinteyum + puthranteyum + parishuddhaathmaavinteyum + naamatthil ee vellllam vaazhtthappettu shuddheekarikkappettirikkunnu.
Bashmodaabo......
(anantaram bhavanatthinte vaathilil kurishadayaallam varachukond)

Onnaayirikkunna pithaavinteyum + puthranteyum + parishuddharoohaayudeyum + naamatthil jeevanullllathum jeevippikkunnathumaaya sleebaayude adayaallatthaal mudrakutthappedunna ee bhavanam ennenneykkum anugrahikkappettu vedippullllathaayittheeratte.

Maathaavum shuddhanmaarum
Arppikkum maddhyasthhathayaal
Vaazhvampodee veedinnum
Veettaarkkum naathhaa! Nalka
(thudarnnu daivamaathaavinteyum parishuddhanmaarudeyum kukkiliyonum cholliyashesham hootthomo)
